sentence.Network_en: Cybele : The Phrygian goddess of nature of ancient asia Minor.
sentence.Network_cn: 西布莉: 古代小亚细亚的弗里吉亚自然女神.

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Phrygia
2. a Thraco-Phrygian language spoken by the ancient inhabitants of Phrygia and now extinct--preserved only in a few inscriptions

auth_sentence.content: The historical Midas was a Phrygian ruler in what is now central Turkey.
